summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Spark Pit MVP - all core features working correctly including JWT auth, invite-code gating, rooms/channels/chat, bounties, bots, and audit logging
passed_tests: Admin user registration (first user becomes admin with active status)
Regular user registration (subsequent users are pending)
Membership gate protection (403 for pending users on protected endpoints)
Room creation, listing, joining, and channel management
Message posting and retrieval via REST API
Bounty CRUD operations (create, list, view, claim, update, status change)
Bot profile creation and room assignment
Frontend registration flow with invite claim UI
UI components with proper data-testid attributes

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all core flows working, minor session timeout during extended testing)
